name: Mid-Century Velvet Armchair
description: Upholstered in a deep forest green performance velvet, this chair features tapered solid walnut legs and a hand-tufted backrest. It offers a firm yet supportive seat designed for long reading sessions.

name: Artisanal Speckled Stoneware Mug
description: Hand-thrown in Vermont. The exterior is left partially unglazed to reveal the raw, sandy texture of the clay, while the interior features a smooth, milky-white reactive glaze.

name: Copper-Cased Mechanical Keyboard
description: A heavyweight typing tool housed in a CNC-machined copper chassis that develops a unique patina over time. Features Gateron Brown switches for a crisp, rhythmic 'thock' sound.

name: Sandalwood & Bourbon Candle
description: Evoking a sun-drenched library, this candle opens with notes of aged leather and dry cedar, settling into a warm, smoky bourbon finish. Poured into a reusable amber glass jar.

name: Full-Grain Leather Weekend Bag
description: Crafted from vegetable-tanned Italian leather, this bag is built to survive decades. The brass hardware is antique-finished, and the interior is lined with rugged cotton duck canvas.

name: Obsidian Japanese Chef's Knife
description: Forged using the San Mai technique with a VG-10 steel core. The handle is scorched charred oak (Shou Sugi Ban) for a waterproof, textured grip and striking dark aesthetic.

name: Organic Merino Wool Throw
description: An oversized throw woven in a classic herringbone pattern. Ethically sourced merino wool provides breathable warmth without the itchiness of traditional wool fibers.

name: Minimalist Brushed Brass Lamp
description: A single continuous arc of brushed brass ending in a frosted glass globe. Emits a warm, diffused light perfect for late-night sketching or focused study.

name: Raw Indigo Selvedge Denim
description: Stiff and unwashed, these 14oz jeans are woven on vintage shuttle looms. They feature a classic red-line selvedge ID and will fade uniquely based on the owner's movements.

name: Aluminum Noise-Cancelling Headphones
description: Wrapped in supple lambskin leather with earcups carved from solid aluminum. 40mm beryllium drivers deliver an airy, expansive soundstage and reference-neutral profile.

name: Aged Western Red Cedar Planter
description: Constructed from rot-resistant cedar with dovetail joints. Left untreated to allow it to weather to a beautiful silvery-grey over time in the garden.

name: Matte White Gooseneck Kettle
description: A sleek, minimalist electric kettle designed for pour-over precision. The matte ceramic finish stays cool, while the base features a hidden OLED temperature screen.

name: Linen-Bound Artist Sketchbook
description: Heavy 160gsm cream paper wrapped in coarse, oatmeal-colored linen. Designed for watercolor and ink with a lay-flat binding for seamless landscape drawing.

name: Solid Raw Brass Fountain Pen
description: A heavy, balanced writing instrument that develops a dark, unique patina. A statement piece that feels like a vintage artifact in the hand.

name: Ocean Plastic Pro Yoga Mat
description: Manufactured from plastic reclaimed from coastlines. Features a laser-etched alignment map on a high-grip surface to help practitioners maintain proper form.

name: Smoked Glass Decanter Set
description: A geometric decanter with four heavy-bottomed tumblers. The charcoal tint of the glass enhances the rich amber colors of aged spirits like scotch or rye.

name: Cold-Pressed Honey & Beeswax Soap
description: Smelling of summer meadows, these bars use raw honey as a humectant. Hand-cut and cured for six weeks to ensure a long-lasting, moisturizing lather.

name: Copper-Plated Ash Wood Trowel
description: Naturally antimicrobial copper plating glides through soil effortlessly. The handle is turned from FSC-certified ash wood, designed to be a garden heirloom.

name: Mist-Grey Bamboo Sheets
description: Silkier than cotton and naturally thermal-regulating. These bamboo-derived sheets have a natural luster and a cool-to-the-touch feel ideal for hot sleepers.

name: Cherry Wood Bluetooth Radio
description: 1950s aesthetic meets modern connectivity. Wrapped in real cherry wood veneer with analog-style tuning knobs and a warm, mid-forward sound profile.
